Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum

The enumeration defining the Fox selectors, used in event mechanism.

Enumerator:
ID_NYI  Not Yet Implemented Identifier.
ID_HELP_ABOUT  The Identifier of the Help/About menu item.
ID_TOOL_ACCOUNT  The Identifier of the Tool/Account menu item.
ID_TOOL_SERVER  The Identifier of the Tool/Account menu item.
ID_LAST  Setting the new value to FXMainWindow::ID_LAST.

Member Data Documentation

FXint RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::switcherChildId [private]

The child switcher's Id.

This ID is incremented for each switcher child we create. So we have the id of the newly created switcher panel

See also:
panelHelpId, panelAccountId, panelServerId.

Definition at line 82 of file xidentwindow.h.

FXint RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::panelHelpId [private]

The Id if the Help switcher's panel.

Contains the unique identifier of this panel. Its value is taken from switcherChildId during creation of the panel.

See also:
switcherChildId.

Definition at line 91 of file xidentwindow.h.

FXSwitcher* RainbruRPG::Gui::XIdentWindow::switcher [protected]
